Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the connection between Al Capone and the quote about a woman president and the Chicago Cubs winning the World Series.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the attribution of the quote to Al Capone.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Al Capone would have made a statement about the Chicago Cubs winning the World Series and a woman becoming president, without any historical basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides alternative explanations for the origin of the quote, suggesting it was a joke started after the Cubs' World Series victory in 2016.
